author: Marcus Aurelius
text: You have power over your mind — not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

author: David Goggins
text: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.

author: Seneca
text: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.

author: James Clear
text: You do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems.

author: Epictetus
text: How long are you going to wait before you demand the best for yourself?

author: Naval Ravikant
text: Play long-term games with long-term people.

author: Miyamoto Musashi
text: It may seem difficult at first, but everything is difficult at first.

author: Cal Newport
text: Clarity about what matters provides clarity about what does not.

author: Lao Tzu
text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

author: Angela Duckworth
text: Enthusiasm is common. Endurance is rare.

author: Jocko Willink
text: Discipline equals freedom.

author: Carol Dweck
text: Why waste time proving how great you are, when you could be getting better?

author: Confucius
text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Aristotle
text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

author: Bruce Lee
text: Absorb what is useful, discard what is not, add what is uniquely your own.

author: William James
text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

author: Albert Einstein
text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

author: Henry Ford
text: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't — you're right.

author: Sun Tzu
text: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.

author: Steve Jobs
text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

author: Muhammad Ali
text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.

author: Tony Robbins
text: Where focus goes, energy flows.

author: Mark Twain
text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
